name: Donut Escape: simple escape game
description:
Donut Escape: help the cute donut escape! score high in this arcade addictive game! Simple and light! Jump in!

Special Features
 Multiplayer! - show your skills
 Challenge Friends - share your score online!
 Achievements - unlock new levels and sweets
 Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

Donut Escape is completely free to play! Enjoy!

Hello Donut lovers! This one is a big one, and without hole! A lot of new features just for you:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
